set(PASTA_BOOTSTRAP_MACROS OFF)
set(PASTA_BOOTSTRAP_TYPES OFF)
set(PASTA_ENABLE_TESTING OFF)
set(PASTA_ENABLE_INSTALL OFF)
add_subdirectory(pasta)


add_subdirectory(vast)
